title: How am I supposed to get mastery 6+7?
body: I get roughly 600 BE every level up, which is a whole day of grinding. It costs over 3000 BE to level up to lvl 6 on a champion. That's a whole 5 days of grinding just to upgrade my level 6 tokens. And then, I can't buy any champions. Please, give us BE after every match.

replies.body: Yeah it cost me 3900 BE to get level 7 Karma which was almost all of my BE, this is pretty silly. It would be so helpful to get BE after every match.
Yeah, BE is really hard to get, unlike IP. If you can get BE after every match like IP, it would help people out.
